Report.Query: SELECT OPER_DATE as searchdate, TIME_SECTION as searchtime, ROUTE_NAME as routename, ROUTE_ID as routeid, OPER_CAP as opercap, PASSENGER_FLOW as passflow, RATIO as ratio, AREA_CODE as areacode, ORG_GROUP as orgname, ORG_GROUP_ID as orgid, row_number() over (order by TIME_SECTION ) as RowsectionNumber FROM RPT_SPLYSECU_PASSFLOWTOCAP
